snippet.title: Book Review: Howl's Moving Castle
snippet.description: Sophie is trapped in her life as the responsible eldest daughter who runs the family hat business and has nothing to look forward to. Everything changes when the evil Witch of the Waste bursts into her shop and, for mys...

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Howl's Moving Castle
snippet.description: Charming Miyazaki fairy tale for tweens and up.

snippet.title: Book Review: Howl's Moving Castle
snippet.description: Young girl turned old lives with a wizard.

snippet.title: Music Review: Kris Allen
snippet.description: Wholesome Idol winner cuts clean yet creative CD.

snippet.title: Music Review: Kris Allen

snippet.title: DVD Review: Take the Money and Run
snippet.description: Generous laughs in satirical early Woody Allen escapade.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Hollywood Ending
snippet.description: Ephemeral, Woody Allen. Only for his fans.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Match Point
snippet.description: Woody Allen film has adult themes, not for kids.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Scoop
snippet.description: Another comic murder mystery from Woody Allen.

snippet.title: Movie Review: The Bourne Ultimatum
snippet.description: Best in the series so far. For mature teens and up.
